Class GameState

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.models.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Container class that holds the complete game state for saving and loading. We implement Serializable to enable binary file persistence, capturing everything needed to restore a game exactly where the player left off.
See Also:

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Determines if the game has reached a conclusion. We check if either player has sunk the required number of ships.
